name: Ganged by Goblins
description:
Oh no the goblins have broken free! Use your shotgun to cull the herd!

My first ever game EVER. This was just me exploring the Godot engine so please be gentle with it! It has a lot of bugs!

Made for the My First Game Jam 2021:
https://itch.io/jam/my-first-game-jam-summer-2021

Assets used because i gave up making my own partway through:

https://sidearm-studios.itch.io/ultimate-sound-fx-bundle

https://danieldiggle.itch.io/sunnyside

https://pondgames.itch.io/ttt-series-4-pack

https://managore.itch.io/m5x7

https://laredgames.itch.io/gems-coins-free
